question: What part of the paper is marked?
options: The text at the bottom center of the part of the paper is marked.
The crease along the right edge of the part of the paper is marked.
The handwritten note in the middle of the part of the paper is marked.
The border on the top side of the part of the paper is marked.
The drawing on the left side of the part of the paper is marked.

inference.prompt:
Carefully watch the first-person view video and pay attention to the cause and sequence of events, the detail and movement of objects, and the action and pose of persons.
Question: What part of the paper is marked? Choose **only one** option from the following list.
Options:
(A) The text at the bottom center of the part of the paper is marked.
(B) The crease along the right edge of the part of the paper is marked.
(C) The handwritten note in the middle of the part of the paper is marked.
(D) The border on the top side of the part of the paper is marked.
(E) The drawing on the left side of the part of the paper is marked.

 Answer format:

inference.output: (E) The drawing on the left side of the part of the paper is marked.
